body:
We've been using spackpm.herokuapp.com to do invitations to slack for a while now, but we can host [slackin](https://github.com/emedvedev/slackin-extended) ourselves.

This has the added benefit of using an updated slackin version that gets the member count right (1200 vs. 990).  It's also more customizable.

- [x] update Slack badge in `README.md`
title: Switch from heroku to slack.spack.io for slack invite badge
